name: Cloakware
overview: Cloakware, Inc. provides software technology solutions for securing business applications and digital assets in enterprise, consumer, and government markets. The company offers Cloakware Datacenter solutions, which enable organizations to meet governance, risk management, and compliance objectives for password management; and Cloakware Consumer Product solutions to protect software and content on personal computers, set-top boxes, mobile phones, and media players. Its Cloakware Datacenter solutions comprise Cloakware Password Authority, a password management solution to automate the life-cycle management of passwords; and professional services, such as datacenter security discovery services, threat risk assessment, password management planning, and system integration. The companyâ€™s Consumer Product solutions include Cloakware Security Suite that comprise software development tools to protect applications against reverse engineering, tampering, and automated attacks; Cloakware Digital Rights Management (DRM) solutions, which allow device original equipment manufacturers to meet compliance and requirements for WMDRM, OMA, and DTCP-IP, as well as other DRMs; consulting and design services; and security assessment and product training services, as well as product installation, integration, and deployment services. Cloakware serves government, retail, and financial services industries, as well as manufacturers of conditional access systems, consumer electronics devices, mobile handsets, set-top boxes, portable media players, and software applications. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Vienna, Virginia with an additional office in Ottawa, Canada, as well as sales offices worldwide. As of December 4, 2007, Cloakware, Inc. is a subsidiary of Irdeto Access BV.

funding_rounds.source_description: Cloakware Secures $10 Million in Series B Round Funding; Funding to Fuel
